file_content.text: Have you been a contract pilot for long?
How long have you been flying?
Since I was a kid, practically. It's in my blood.
In fact, I'd be flying right now if you weren't wasting time chatting. So why don't you get on that, huh?
I was thinking we could share a quick round of Corellian whiskeys.
[Flirt] Can I buy you a drink?
You're not my type, bucket-head. Keep on walking.
The general is just used to giving out orders. She doesn't mean any disrespect.
Don't let Garza get to you.
Whatever. If you want to get bossed around all day, be my guest. But leave me out.
Feel free to get on with busting my ship out now.
I'd better get on with the mission.
